name: Block Room
description:
Pass the levels on platforms, springs, fans, overcome spikes and angry enemies, as well as moments when everything turns upside down. Controlling the physics and the right moment to walk or jump helps you overcome each challenge proposed by the game's villain.

BE THE BEST IN THE CHALLENGES OF EACH PHASE


You have been invited to training with varied challenges, from the unrealistic mind of John Meat, the largest meat manufacturer in the world. Upon arriving on the island of animals, John imprisons and puts everyone in training, which includes you. And the only way to defeat him is to overcome all of his crazy challenges.

USE THE DANGERS OF THE PHASES TO YOUR FAVOR


As everything is controlled by John's crazy mind, you can use the challenges to your advantage, from thorns, springs and angry enemies, everything improves your skills to overcome the challenges.

DEVELOP YOUR PLAYING STYLE


Its platform style makes the game universal for all players, there will be moments when precision and timing will help you pass the level, others, speed and springs will help you progress, and moments when everything will be upside down. So be careful to know how to pass each phase.

PROTECT THE ISLAND FROM BUGS


John Meat intends to turn Animal Island into farms and pastures for his cows, pigs and chickens. Even though you are stuck in training, the animals are plotting ways to expel you, and you are essential to overcome the challenges and free the island from John Meat's ambitions.
